   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to Distributed Data Analytics Tutorial Using Python!
===================================================================
This workshop will provide an introduction on how we can use Python 
libraries for distributed data analytics. To follow this tutorial,
familiarity with Python is required.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:
